Monster Rolodex

Filter Monster by name: import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { DataService } from '../Services/data.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent implements OnInit { monsterDetails: any; filterBy: string; constructor(private dataService: DataService){ } ngOnInit(): void { this.monsterDetails = this.dataService.getData('users'); } }
